name: No Man's Land (cattatonicat)
description:
Ciao,

No Man's Land is made to be a virtual space, and it's not a game in a traditional sense. There's a background noise / sound so be aware of that. You might miss it if you have your sound set to low. 

I made this back in 2017 when I had just started learning how to use Unity, so there's no title screen or UI or anything. I don't have an exit button either so please quit the application in a fashionably reasonable creative method of your choice. Maybe I will work on this again so there is a proper way to exit the game but as of right now my focus is elsewhere. - Hint: I've been spending a stupid amount of time trying to build a pyramid.

Interpret the work as however it resonates,  and let the fun begin!

(...but if you would like to know what I was thinking about when I made this, here's a hint: Do you feel that you belong where you are right now, emotionally and physically? Is who you portray to be on the outside who you are? )

Addio!

NOTE: I made the project in Windows so Unity will only let me export it for Windows friendly file. Mac users, too bad... ╮ (. ❛ ᴗ ❛.) ╭
